title: Please help me identify this font
content:
Hey,  
does anyone know the name of this font?

Thanks and greetings from Germany  
Carpio

Font: 

 Brain Flower 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063307/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bildschirmfoto 2014-04-22 um 16.49.14.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063307/http:/typophile.com/files/Bildschirmfoto%202014-04-22%20um%2016.49.14_0.png) | 310.47 KB |
author: Carpio

comments.content: Could be Douxie [Brain Flower](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063307/http:/douxiegirl.com/fonts) by Denise Bentulan. More in the same vein: [Moon Flower](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/%5B%5Bhttp%3A/%252Fdouxiegirl.com/fonts), [Italo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/antipixel/italo), [The Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/la-goupil/the-hand), [Visum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/visum)

Thank you, you are great, it helped so much!

:-)
